short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a CRM contact with one-click. Add needed notes instantly. Never lose an important person again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make Discord work for you!

Save important chats outside of Discord.
Keep an eye on your VIP's without getting lost.
Never sift through 1000's of Discord messages again.
